TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ErrObject extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于使用 对象标识和处理运行时错误的属性和过程。

span.span: The module contains properties and procedures used to identify and handle run-time errors using the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrObject` 模块`Err`支持对象。The `ErrObject` module supports the `Err` object. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用构造错误消息对话框`Err`中的对象的属性。This example uses the properties of the `Err` object in constructing an error-message dialog box. 请注意, 当您首先使用`Clear`方法时, 会发生什么情况:然后, 使用`Raise`方法生成 Visual Basic 错误时, Visual Basic 的默认值将成为该`Err`对象的属性。Notice what happens when you use the `Clear` method first: When you then generate a Visual Basic error with the `Raise` method, Visual Basic's default values become the properties of the `Err` object. ```vb Dim Msg As String ' If an error occurs, construct an error message. On Error Resume Next ' Defer error handling. Err.Clear Err.Raise(6) ' Generate an "Overflow" error. ' Check for error, then show message. If Err.Number <> 0 Then Msg = "Error # " & Str(Err.Number) & " was generated by " _ & Err.Source & ControlChars.CrLf & Err.Description MsgBox(Msg, MsgBoxStyle.Information, "Error") End If ```

span.span: On Error Statement (Visual Basic)
Try...Catch...Finally Statement (Visual Basic)
Keywords (Visual Basic)

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

span.span: Visual Basic Run-Time Library Members

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除 对象的所有属性设置。

span.span: Clears all property settings of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在`Clear`处理错误后, `Err`使用显式清除对象, 例如在使用延迟的`On Error Resume Next`错误处理时。Use `Clear` to explicitly clear the `Err` object after an error has been handled, such as when you use deferred error handling with `On Error Resume Next`. 当`Clear`以下任一语句执行时, 将自动调用方法:The `Clear` method is called automatically whenever any of the following statements executes: - 任何类型的`Resume`语句Any type of `Resume` statement - `Exit Sub`、`Exit Function` 或 `Exit Property``Exit Sub`, `Exit Function`, or `Exit Property` - Any `On Error`语句Any `On Error` statement - Any `Try...Catch...Finally`语句Any `Try...Catch...Finally` statement > [!NOTE] > 在`On Error Resume Next`处理访问其他对象的`On Error GoTo`过程中生成的错误时, 构造可能更好。The `On Error Resume Next` construct may be preferable to `On Error GoTo` when handling errors generated during access to other objects. 在`Err`每次与对象交互后进行检查将消除代码访问了哪个对象的歧义:您可以确定哪个对象放置了错误代码`Err.Number`, 以及哪个对象最初生成了错误 (在中`Err.Source`指定的对象)。Checking `Err` after each interaction with an object removes ambiguity about which object was accessed by the code: You can be sure which object placed the error code in `Err.Number`, as well as which object originally generated the error (the object specified in `Err.Source`). ## Examples 此示例使用`Err`对象的`Clear`方法将`Err`对象的数值属性重置为零, 并将其字符串属性重置为长度为零的字符串。This example uses the `Err` object's `Clear` method to reset the numeric properties of the `Err` object to zero and its string properties to zero-length strings. 如果不调用`Clear`, 则的第二次`MsgBox`调用会显示相同的错误消息。Without the call to `Clear`, the second call to `MsgBox` would display the same error message. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

span.span: On Error Statement (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置 表达式，该表达式包含与某个错误关联的描述性字符串。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing a descriptive string associated with an error.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置 表达式，该表达式包含与某个错误关联的描述性字符串。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing a descriptive string associated with an error.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Description`属性设置包含错误的简短说明。The `Description` property setting consists of a short description of the error. 使用此属性来向用户发出警报, 指出您无法或不希望处理的错误。Use this property to alert the user to an error that you cannot or do not want to handle. 当生成用户定义的错误时, 将错误的简短说明分配给`Description`属性。When generating a user-defined error, assign a short description of your error to the `Description` property. 如果未填充 `Description`属性, 并且属性的值与 Visual Basic 运行时错误对应, 则生成错误时, 将在属性中设置该函数返回的字符串。 `Description`If the `Description` property is not filled in, and the value of the property corresponds to a Visual Basic run-time error, then the string returned by the function is set in the `Description` property when the error is generated. ## Examples 此示例将用户定义的消息分配给`Description` `Err`对象的属性。This example assigns a user-defined message to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

public: property int Erl { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取指示上一条执行语句的行号的整数。

span.span: Gets an integer indicating the line number of the last executed statement.

value.span: 最后执行的语句的行号。

span.span: The line number of the last executed statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Visual Basic 没有遇到任何行号, 则返回0。If Visual Basic encounters no line numbers, it returns 0. ## Examples 此示例使用`Erl`属性指示行号。This example uses the `Erl` property to indicate the line number. ``` 10: On Error Resume Next 20: Err.Raise(60000) ' Returns 20. 30: MsgBox(Erl()) ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance class System.Exception GetException() cil managed

summary.span: 返回表示所发生错误的异常。

span.span: Returns the exception representing the error that occurred.

returns.span: 表示所发生错误的异常。

span.span: The exception representing the error that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetException`函数只能`Err`从对象类中使用。The `GetException` function is available only from the `Err` object class. 它使用`Err`对象的`Exception`属性来显示已发生的错误。It works with the `Exception` property of the `Err` object to display the error that has occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码显示分配给`Err`对象中的异常的消息:The following code displays the message assigned to the exception in the `Err` object: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#66](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#66)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int HelpContext { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.HelpContext : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 ，它包含帮助文件中某个主题的上下文 ID。

span.span: Returns or sets an containing the context ID for a topic in a Help file.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置一个 ，它包含帮助文件中某个主题的上下文 ID。

span.span: Returns or sets an containing the context ID for a topic in a Help file.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HelpContext`属性用于显示应用程序的上下文相关帮助。The `HelpContext` property is used to display context-sensitive Help for an application. 如果在中`HelpFile`指定了帮助文件, 则`HelpContext`使用属性来自动显示标识的帮助文件。If a Help file is specified in `HelpFile`, the `HelpContext` property is used to automatically display the Help file identified. `HelpFile`如果和`HelpContext`属性都为空 , 则检查属性的值。If both the `HelpFile` and `HelpContext` properties are empty, the value of the property is checked. 如果`Number`属性的值与 Visual Basic 运行时错误值相对应, 则使用错误的 Visual Basic 帮助上下文 ID。If the value of the `Number` property corresponds to a Visual Basic run-time error value, then the Visual Basic Help context ID for the error is used. 如果`Number`属性的值不对应于 Visual Basic 错误, 则会显示 Visual Basic 帮助文件的内容屏幕。If the value of the `Number` property does not correspond to a Visual Basic error, the contents screen for the Visual Basic Help file is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 应在应用程序中编写例程来处理典型错误。You should write routines in your application to handle typical errors. 使用对象进行编程时, 可以使用对象的帮助文件来提高错误处理的质量, 或者在错误不可恢复时向用户显示一条有意义的消息。When programming with an object, you can use the object's Help file to improve the quality of your error handling, or to display a meaningful message to your user if the error is not recoverable. ## Examples 此示例使用`Err`对象`HelpContext`的属性来显示`Overflow`错误的 Visual Basic 帮助主题。This example uses the `HelpContext` property of the `Err` object to show the Visual Basic Help topic for the `Overflow` error. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HelpFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HelpFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 表达式，该表达式包含帮助文件的完全限定路径。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing the fully qualified path to a Help file.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置一个 表达式，该表达式包含帮助文件的完全限定路径。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression containing the fully qualified path to a Help file.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果帮助文件是由`HelpFile`属性指定的, 则当用户按 "错误消息" 对话框中的 "帮助" 键 (或 F1 键) 时, 将自动调用它。If a Help file is specified by the `HelpFile` property, it is automatically called when the user presses the Help key (or the F1 key) in the error message dialog box. `HelpContext`如果属性包含指定文件的有效上下文 ID, 则会自动显示该主题。If the `HelpContext` property contains a valid context ID for the specified file, that topic is automatically displayed. 如果未`HelpFile`指定, 则显示 Visual Basic 帮助文件。If no `HelpFile` is specified, the Visual Basic Help file is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 应在应用程序中编写例程来处理典型错误。You should write routines in your application to handle typical errors. 使用对象进行编程时, 可以使用对象的帮助文件来提高错误处理的质量, 或者在错误不可恢复时向用户显示一条有意义的消息。When programming with an object, you can use the object's Help file to improve the quality of your error handling, or to display a meaningful message to your user if the error is not recoverable. ## Examples 此示例使用`Err`对象`HelpFile`的属性来启动帮助系统。This example uses the `HelpFile` property of the `Err` object to start the Help system. 默认情况下, `HelpFile`属性包含 Visual Basic 帮助文件的名称。By default, the `HelpFile` property contains the name of the Visual Basic Help file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastDllError As Integer
public: property int LastDllError { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取调用动态链接库 (DLL) 所产生的系统错误代码。

span.span: Gets a system error code produced by a call to a dynamic-link library (DLL).

value.span: 调用动态链接库 (DLL) 所产生的系统错误代码。

span.span: A system error code produced by a call to a dynamic-link library (DLL).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅适用于从 Visual Basic 代码发出的 DLL 调用。The property applies only to DLL calls made from Visual Basic code. 进行这样的调用时, 被调用的函数通常返回指示成功或失败的代码, 并填充属性。When such a call is made, the called function usually returns a code indicating success or failure, and the property is filled. 查看 DLL 函数的文档, 以确定表示成功或失败的返回值。Check the documentation for the DLL's functions to determine the return values that indicate success or failure. 每当返回失败代码时, Visual Basic 应用程序都应立即检查属性。Whenever the failure code is returned, the Visual Basic application should immediately check the property. 如果设置了属性, 则不会引发异常。No exception is raised when the property is set. > [!NOTE] > 此 属性受保护, 这有助于防止它从不受信任的代码进行访问。The property is protected by , which helps prevent it from being accessed from untrusted code. 但是, 只要求直接调用方具有权限。However, requires only the immediate caller to have permission. 如果你的代码可从部分受信任的代码调用, 则无需验证即可公开的值会带来安全风险。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, exposing the value of without validation is a security risk. > > 有关如何使用成员的重要限制, 请参阅[需求与LinkDemand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5)。For important limitations about how to use the member, see [Demand vs. LinkDemand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5). 有关权限的详细信息, 请参阅和[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information about permissions, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). 注意对于智能设备, 此属性始终返回零。Note For smart devices this property always returns zero. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 Windows API 中`LastDllError`调用函数后使用属性。The following example shows how you can use the `LastDllError` property after calling a function in the Windows API. 此`PrintWindowCoordinates`过程使用窗口的句柄并`GetWindowRect`调用函数。The `PrintWindowCoordinates` procedure takes a handle to a window and calls the `GetWindowRect` function. `GetWindowRect`用构成窗口的矩形的边的长度填充 RECT 数据结构。`GetWindowRect` fills the RECT data structure with the lengths of the sides of the rectangle that make up the window. 如果传递的句柄无效, 则会出现错误, 并且可以通过`LastDllError`属性使用错误号。If you pass an invalid handle, an error occurs, and the error number is available through the `LastDllError` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#8)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#9)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#10)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Number { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Number : int with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定错误的数值。

span.span: Returns or sets a numeric value specifying an error.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置指定错误的数值。

span.span: Returns or sets a numeric value specifying an error.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除之外`Raise` `Number`的所有参数都是可选的。All of the `Raise` arguments except `Number` are optional. 如果省略可选参数, 并且`Err`对象的属性设置包含尚未清除的值, 则这些值将用作错误的值。If you omit optional arguments, and the property settings of the `Err` object contain values that have not been cleared, those values serve as the values for your error. 由于对象比你在`Error`语句中生成错误时提供了更丰富的`Raise`信息, 因此对编写类模块时生成错误很有用。 `Err`Because the `Err` object gives richer information than when you generate errors with the `Error` statement, `Raise` is useful for generating errors when writing class modules. 例如, 通过`Raise`方法, 生成错误的源可以`Source`在属性中指定, 可以引用错误的联机帮助, 等等。For example, with the `Raise` method, the source that generated the error can be specified in the `Source` property, online Help for the error can be referenced, and so on. 当从对象返回用户定义的错误时, 通过将`Err.Number`您选择的数字作为错误代码添加`VbObjectError`到常量中来进行设置。When returning a user-defined error from an object, set `Err.Number` by adding the number you selected as an error code to the `VbObjectError` constant. 例如, 使用以下代码将数字1051返回为错误代码:For example, you use the following code to return the number 1051 as an error code: [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#13)] ## Examples 此示例演示了错误处理例程中`Number`的属性的典型用法。This example illustrates a typical use of the `Number` property in an error-handling routine. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 此示例使用`Err`对象的`Raise`方法在 Visual Basic 编写的函数中生成原始错误。This example uses the `Err` object's `Raise` method to generate an original error within a function written in Visual Basic. 调用函数可以捕获并向用户报告错误。The calling function can catch the error and report it to the user. 请注意, `CallingProcedure`该过程会将你可以`Err`从对象派生的信息类型与可从`Exception`对象派生的信息进行比较。Notice that procedure `CallingProcedure` contrasts the type of information that you can derive from an `Err` object with the information that you can derive from an `Exception` object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

span.span: is greater than 65535.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Raise (int Number, object Source = null, object Description = null, object HelpFile = null, object HelpContext = null);
.method public instance void Raise(int32 Number, object Source, object Description, object HelpFile, object HelpContext) cil managed
Public Sub Raise (Number As Integer, Optional Source As Object = null, Optional Description As Object = null, Optional HelpFile As Object = null, Optional HelpContext As Object = null)
member this.Raise : int * obj * obj * obj * obj -> unit

param.name: Number
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required.

param.span: 标识错误本质的 整数。

span.span: integer that identifies the nature of the error.

param.span: Visual Basic 错误处于 0 到 65535 的范围内：范围 0 到 512 保留用于系统错误，范围 513 到 65535 则用于用户定义的错误。

span.span: Visual Basic errors are in the range 0-65535; the range 0-512 is reserved for system errors; the range 513-65535 is available for user-defined errors.

param.span: 当在类模块中将 属性设置为您自己的错误代码时，将错误代码号添加到 常数。

span.span: When setting the property to your own error code in a class module, you add your error code number to the constant.

param.span: 例如，将 vbObjectError + 513 分配给 属性，生成错误号 513。

span.span: For example, to generate the error number 513, assign vbObjectError + 513 to the property.

param.name: Source
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 表达式，用于命名生成错误的对象或应用程序。

span.span: expression naming the object or application that generated the error.

param.span: 设置对象的这一属性时，应使用如下形式：project.class。

span.span: When setting this property for an object, use the form project.class.

param.span: 如果未指定 ，则使用当前 Visual Basic 项目的进程 ID。

span.span: If is not specified, the process ID of the current Visual Basic project is used.

param.name: Description
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 描述错误的 表达式。

span.span: expression describing the error.

param.span: 如果未指定，则检查 属性值。

span.span: If unspecified, the value in the property is examined.

param.span: 如果它可以映射到 Visual Basic 运行时错误代码，则将 函数要返回的字符串用作 属性。

span.span: If it can be mapped to a Visual Basic run-time error code, the string that would be returned by the function is used as the property.

param.span: 如果没有对应于 属性的 Visual Basic 错误，则使用"应用程序定义的错误或对象定义的错误"消息。

span.span: If there is no Visual Basic error corresponding to the property, the "Application-defined or object-defined error" message is used.

param.name: HelpFile
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 帮助文件的完全限定路径，在该文件中可找到有关此错误的帮助信息。

span.span: The fully qualified path to the Help file in which help on this error can be found.

param.span: 如果未指定该参数，则 Visual Basic 使用 Visual Basic 帮助文件的完全限定的驱动器、路径和文件名。

span.span: If unspecified, Visual Basic uses the fully qualified drive, path, and file name of the Visual Basic Help file.

param.name: HelpContext
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 上下文 ID，用于标识 中提供有关错误的帮助主题。

span.span: The context ID identifying a topic within that provides help for the error.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，则使用与 属性对应的错误的 Visual Basic 帮助文件上下文 ID（如果存在）。

span.span: If omitted, the Visual Basic Help-file context ID for the error corresponding to the property is used, if it exists.

summary.span: 生成一个运行时错误；可以替代 语句使用。

span.span: Generates a run-time error; can be used instead of the statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除之外`Raise` `Number`的所有参数都是可选的。All of the `Raise` arguments except `Number` are optional. 如果省略可选参数, 并且`Err`对象的属性设置包含尚未清除的值, 则这些值将用作错误的值。If you omit optional arguments, and the property settings of the `Err` object contain values that have not been cleared, those values serve as the values for your error. 由于对象比你在`Error`语句中生成错误时提供了更丰富的`Raise`信息, 因此对编写类模块时生成错误很有用。 `Err`Because the `Err` object gives richer information than when you generate errors with the `Error` statement, `Raise` is useful for generating errors when writing class modules. 例如, 通过`Raise`方法, 生成错误的源可以`Source`在属性中指定, 可以引用错误的联机帮助, 等等。For example, with the `Raise` method, the source that generated the error can be specified in the `Source` property, online Help for the error can be referenced, and so on. ## Examples 此示例使用`Err`对象的`Raise`方法在 Visual Basic 编写的函数中生成错误。This example uses the `Err` object's `Raise` method to generate an error within a function written in Visual Basic. 调用函数可以捕获错误并使用消息框将其报告给用户。The calling function can catch the error and report it to the user with a message box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Source : string with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 表达式，该表达式指定最初生成错误的对象或应用程序的名称。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression specifying the name of the object or application that originally generated the error.
Read/write.

value.span: 返回或设置一个 表达式，该表达式指定最初生成错误的对象或应用程序的名称。

span.span: Returns or sets a expression specifying the name of the object or application that originally generated the error.
Read/write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定一个`String`表达式, 该表达式表示生成错误的对象; 该表达式通常是对象的类名或进程 ID。 `Source`The `Source` property specifies a `String` expression representing the object that generated the error; the expression is usually the object's class name or process ID. 当代码无法处理在访问的对象中生成的错误时, 可以使用属性提供信息。`Source`Use the `Source` property to provide information when your code is unable to handle an error generated in an accessed object. 例如, 如果您访问 microsoft excel 并生成`Division by zero`错误, 则 Microsoft excel 会将错误代码设置`Err.Number`为该错误的错误代码, `Source`并将设置为 ""。For example, if you access Microsoft Excel and it generates a `Division by zero` error, Microsoft Excel sets `Err.Number` to its error code for that error and sets `Source` to "Excel.Application". 当应用程序从代码生成错误时, `Source`为你的应用程序的编程 ID。When the application is generating an error from code, `Source` is your application's programmatic ID. 在类中, `Source`应包含包含窗体*项目*的名称。*类*。Within a class, `Source` should contain a name having the form *project*.*class*. 当代码中出现意外错误时, `Source`会自动填充属性。When an unexpected error occurs in your code, the `Source` property is automatically filled in. 对于模块中的错误, `Source`包含项目名称。For errors in a module, `Source` contains the project name. ## Examples 此示例演示如何在典型的`Source`错误处理例程中使用属性。This example demonstrates the use of the `Source` property in a typical error-handling routine. 当从`Class1`中引发错误时, 会将`"Class1"`该字符串分配`Source`给`Err`对象的属性。When an error is raised from `Class1`, the string `"Class1"` is assigned to the `Source` property of the `Err` object. 然后, 此字符串会显示在说明错误的源和编号的信息性消息中。This string is then displayed in an informative message indicating the source and number of the error. [!code-vb[VbVbalrErrorHandling#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrErrorHandling/VB/Class1.vb#15)]

span.span: On Error Statement (Visual Basic)
